title: Trump Reverts to Diplomacy With Iran, but the Road Is Narrow
summary_full: Iran is skilled at prolonging negotiations over its nuclear program, and seems to be hoping President Trump is out for a quick win, rather than a prolonged regional war.
summary_public: Iran is skilled at prolonging negotiations over its nuclear program, and seems to be hoping President Trump is out for a quick win, rather than a prolonged regional war.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: Iran is skilled at prolonging negotiations over its nuclear program
